author: breser
msg: Fix a number of bugs in h2i.pl that prevented the get_version() and
get_log2() ra_plugin vtable functions from being wrapped and that caused the
Perl bindings to break after r11155 was committed.
* subversion/bindings/swig/perl/native/h2i.pl
Eat up the const keyword with the return type.
Handle functions that take no arguments (i.e. have void as their only
argument).
The end of a statment isn't a blank line it is a semi-colon.  This code still
won't deal with multiple declarations per line, which while technically legal
is ugly code.

author: julianfoad
msg: Group the command-line options for specifying a log message together in the
table of svn commands.  There are several of them, and several commands that
use them, and this helps by causing these options always to appear together
and in the same order in the output of 'svn help SUBCOMMAND'.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(SVN_CL__LOG_MSG_OPTIONS): New macro.
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Replace bunches of options with the macro.

author: karolszk
msg: Polish translation big update.
* subversion/po/pl.po: added new translations and updated many fuzziness.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix issue #2063: handle platform eol-style in propedit. Also fix bug where
the propval was recoded to the native edit before the editor was invoked, but
recoded from the encoding specified by --encoding after the edit. Now,
the editor is invoked with a temporary file with the propval encoded as
specified by the command line flag.
* clients/cmdline/cl.h (svn_cl__edit_externally): Add as_text and encoding
args and change contents and edited_contents to be svn_string_t instead of
plain const char *.
* clients/cmdline/util.c (svn_cl__edit_externally): If as_text is true,
translate/detranslate contents before/after editing, both encoding and
eol-style. Get rid of unnecessary new_propval temp variable.
(svn_cl__get_log_message): Adjust for new signature of
svn_cl__edit_externally. Don't detranslate message after editing.
* clients/cmdline/propedit-cmd.c (svn_cl__propedit): Adjust for new signature
of svn_cl__edit_externally. Pass encoding parameter to that function.
Don't detranslate property value.

author: ringstrom
msg: Expand and correct a few code comments after Karl's review of r11211.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/liveprops.c
(dav_svn_insert_prop, dav_svn_get_last_modified_time): Just do it.
